meanings.definition: Relating to citizenship or the duties of a citizen.
meanings.sent1: She showed her civically responsible side by volunteering at the local shelter.
meanings.sent2: The civically engaged students organized a neighborhood clean-up event.
meanings.sent3: The civically minded squirrel diligently collected acorns for the winter.
meanings.sent4: His civically oriented mindset guided him to always vote in elections.
meanings.sent5: The civically aware community came together to address important issues.

meanings.definition: In a manner that pertains to the community or society as a whole.
meanings.sent1: The students worked civically to improve the playground for everyone.
meanings.sent2: She spoke civically about the need for better public transportation.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed civically as if discussing the neighborhood gossip.
meanings.sent4: The stars shone civically, lighting up the night sky for all to see.
meanings.sent5: The music played civically, bringing people together in harmony.
